window_summary: From 2024-05-03 to 2024-05-10, NVDA closed at 88.79 (May 3) and 89.88 (May 10); SMH closed at 217.73 (May 3) and 223.30 (May 10). 5 daily returns were used. NVDA price rose ~1.23% vs SMH ~2.56%; NVDA vs benchmark: relative strength ~-1.33%. Beta ≈ 1.687; correlation ≈ 0.98; NVDA annualized volatility ≈ 37.17%; max drawdown within window ≈ -3.68%. Sources: NVDA history (Yahoo Finance, May 2024 data) and SMH history (Yahoo Finance, May 2024 data).
